name: Physical Fight Prototype
description:
Controls:

If you don't understand, how to control:

Click the left mouse button above a ball to grab it.

Hold the mouse and move it to accelerate the ball.

A ball gets damage when it gets accelerated. Fast accelerations happen at collisions.

If a ball can connect, click the right mouse button above a ball, then move the mouse to another ball and release the button to connect.

Further reading:

This game was inspired from "World of Goo"

I'd like to have a similar gameplay for a multiplayer game, maybe some magic fight, where you physically can throw objects or even other players.

This is not really finished, and won't be. Only the first two levels have a goal.

Press `S` to see other levels, also some funny test levels.
